analysis.description:
VestingContractWTTEST (/unique_chucks/37/0x71aaf9dc418e9dde76aee42e431fc203d9cfd0c2.sol#11-165) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transfer (/unique_chucks/37/0x71aaf9dc418e9dde76aee42e431fc203d9cfd0c2.sol#149-165)

Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/37/0x71aaf9dc418e9dde76aee42e431fc203d9cfd0c2.sol:
	Contract VestingContractWTTEST has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/37/0x71aaf9dc418e9dde76aee42e431fc203d9cfd0c2.sol#75-77)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Reentrancy in VestingContractWTTEST.transfer (/unique_chucks/37/0x71aaf9dc418e9dde76aee42e431fc203d9cfd0c2.sol#149-165):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(value <= we_test_token.balanceOf(this) && value <= account_data[msg.sender].current_balance && account_data[msg.sender].current_transferred + value <= account_data[msg.sender].current_limit) (/unique_chucks/37/0x71aaf9dc418e9dde76aee42e431fc203d9cfd0c2.sol#150-155)
	- we_test_token.transfer(to,value) (/unique_chucks/37/0x71aaf9dc418e9dde76aee42e431fc203d9cfd0c2.sol#155-165)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- account_data (/unique_chucks/37/0x71aaf9dc418e9dde76aee42e431fc203d9cfd0c2.sol#159-161)
	- account_data (/unique_chucks/37/0x71aaf9dc418e9dde76aee42e431fc203d9cfd0c2.sol#162)

elements.expression: require(bool)(value <= we_test_token.balanceOf(this) && value <= account_data[msg.sender].current_balance && account_data[msg.sender].current_transferred + value <= account_data[msg.sender].current_limit)

analysis.description:

	- pragma solidity^0.4.21 (/unique_chucks/37/0x71aaf9dc418e9dde76aee42e431fc203d9cfd0c2.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_we_test_token' of VestingContractWTTEST.VestingContractWTTEST (/unique_chucks/37/0x71aaf9dc418e9dde76aee42e431fc203d9cfd0c2.sol#57-58) is not in mixedCase
